alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:50PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST BATON ROUGE, SOUTHEASTERN POINTE COUPEE, IBERVILLE AND NORTHWESTERN ASSUMPTION PARISHES THROUGH 830 PM CDT... At 749 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ramah, or 16 miles southeast of Krotz Springs, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plaquemine, Addis, Brusly, Maringouin, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Ramah, Erwinville, and Bayou Sorrel. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 128 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
